author: Joezczhang
body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] Write a descriptive title.
- [ ] Make sure you are able to repro it on the [latest released version](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases)
- [x] Search the existing issues.
- [ ] Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- [ ] Refer to [Differences between Windows PowerShell 5.1 and PowerShell](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/differences-from-windows-powershell).

### Steps to reproduce

I am writing a scrip that auto login, i got a example in https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/7dc4587014bfa22919c933607bf564f0ba53db2e/test/powershell/Host/assets/Read-Host.Output.expect.
but there is something error just like below:
Line |  "prompt: $" { send "input\r" ; exp_continue }
  10 |     Unexpected token '{' in expression or statement.




### Expected behavior

```console
this scrip should exit with 0
```


### Actual behavior

```console
Unexpected token '{' in expression or statement.
```


### Error details

```console
Unexpected token '{' in expression or statement.
```


### Environment data

```powershell
powershell-7.2.2-win-x64
```


### Visuals

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/89260661/162612877-2746881b-6be1-44ef-9f16-2a53a5e487b7.png)

comments.author: kasini3000
comments.body:
are you looking for expect powershell version? i write one https://gitee.com/chuanjiao10/kasini3000/blob/master/k_run_ip_port_w2l_user_expect_pwd.ps1
Gitee
k_run_ip_port_w2l_user_expect_pwd.ps1 · chuanjiao10/kasini3000 - Gitee.com
类似于Puppet，Ansible，pipeline。号称比ansible好10倍，具有批量远程推送脚本，执行脚本，远程传递代码块，定时执行的，devops运维工具。

comments.author: Joezczhang
comments.body:
Yse, I am searching solution like expect in linux. i want to do adb shell with account is a, password is b. I finished it by vbs,like below Dim WshShell Set WshShell=WScrip.CreateObject(“WScrip.Shell”) WshShell.Run "cmd.exe" WshShell.SendKeys "adb shell" WScrip.Sleep 2000 WshShell.SendKeys "a" WScrip.Sleep 2000 WshShell.SendKeys "b" WScrip.Sleep 2000 is there a simple solution? i can't get https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/Await/0.8 by internet, the link does not work. hope for more information
Await 0.8
Await - A modern implementation of EXPECT for Windows. For a demo, see: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tKyAVm7bXcQ

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: This doesn't look like an issue with pwsh itself, so I will convert this to a discussion for the time being. 🙂

title: Unexpected token '{' in expression or statement
